title: Dexter's Laboratory
description: Dexter is a boy genius with a hidden lab where he creates amazing inventions. Constantly interrupted by his sister Dee Dee, Dexter navigates the chaos of science and sibling rivalry in this witty cartoon classic.

title: Rugrats
description: The world is a big adventure when you’re a baby. Follow Tommy, Chuckie, and friends as they explore their surroundings, battle imaginary monsters, and learn about life in this heartwarming and hilarious series.

title: The Powerpuff Girls
description: Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup—three super-powered sisters—fight villains, monsters, and the forces of evil in the city of Townsville. Created from sugar, spice, and everything nice, they’re pint-sized heroes with big hearts.

title: Animaniacs
description: Join the Warner siblings—Yakko, Wakko, and Dot—as they break the fourth wall, parody pop culture, and bring slapstick mayhem to the studio lot. Each episode is packed with songs, skits, and outrageous humor.

title: Samurai Jack
description: A stoic samurai from the past is cast into a dark future ruled by the shape-shifting demon Aku. In a visually stunning odyssey, Jack must find a way back to his time to undo the evil that plagues the world.

title: Batman: The Animated Series
description: Gotham’s dark knight faces his infamous rogues in a brooding, beautifully animated series. With film noir visuals and mature storytelling, Batman: TAS is considered one of the greatest superhero shows of all time.

title: Inspector Gadget
description: Go-Go-Gadget! Join a clueless cyborg detective as he fights the evil M.A.D. organization. Luckily, his niece Penny and her dog Brain are always there to save the day—secretly!

title: Pinky and the Brain
description: Every night, one mouse schemes to take over the world—while the other muddles the plan. This witty, darkly comedic spin-off from Animaniacs is a cult favorite with satirical genius.

title: Johnny Bravo
description: Johnny Bravo is a self-absorbed, muscle-bound man who believes he's irresistible to women, often to hilarious effect. With over-the-top Elvis impersonations and pop culture parodies, the show offers fast-paced comedy and slapstick.

title: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
description: Prince Adam of Eternia transforms into He-Man to protect his magical planet from the evil Skeletor. Armed with a powerful sword and allies like Teela and Battle Cat, He-Man fights to uphold justice and balance.

title: Chip 'n Dale: Rescue Rangers
description: Chip and Dale lead a detective agency alongside Gadget, Monterey Jack, and Zipper. Solving tiny crimes with oversized obstacles, the Rescue Rangers tackle mysteries with teamwork, clever gadgets, and tons of charm.

title: Captain Planet and the Planeteers
description: Five teens with magical rings summon Captain Planet to combat pollution and protect Earth. With an environmental message, each episode highlights global unity, sustainability, and responsibility.

title: MASK
description: The Mobile Armored Strike Kommand (M.A.S.K.) battles the criminal organization V.E.N.O.M. with transforming vehicles and high-tech masks. Combining mystery, action, and futuristic warfare, M.A.S.K. became a cult classic.

title: Biker Mice from Mars
description: Three motorbike-riding mice from Mars—Throttle, Modo, and Vinnie—land on Earth to fight the evil Plutarkians exploiting the planet. The show blends humor, action, and 90s rock vibes in a post-apocalyptic tone.

title: She-Ra: Princess of Power
description: Adora, twin sister of Prince Adam, transforms into She-Ra and leads the Great Rebellion against the oppressive Horde on Etheria. Empowering and bold, She-Ra stood as a female counterpart to He-Man.

title: SilverHawks
description: A group of cyborg heroes with metallic wings patrol the galaxy, battling Mon*Star and his gang. Each member brings unique abilities to this action-packed, space-themed cartoon from the creators of ThunderCats.

title: Care Bears
description: Living in Care-a-Lot, these cuddly bears use their belly badges to spread love and tackle emotional challenges. From Cheer Bear to Grumpy Bear, they teach kids empathy, friendship, and self-expression.

title: Rainbow Brite
description: Rainbow Brite and her sprite companion Starlite protect Rainbow Land from villains like Murky Dismal. With her magical color belt, she brings brightness and hope to a world plagued by gloom.

title: My Little Pony
description: Set in Dream Valley, magical ponies defend their land from dark forces. Episodes revolve around friendship, courage, and kindness with unicorns, pegasi, and Earth ponies teaming up for magical quests.

title: The Adventures of Teddy Ruxpin
description: Teddy Ruxpin leaves his homeland to explore the lands of Grundo, discovering ancient treasures, facing danger, and learning valuable life lessons with his friends Grubby and Newton Gimmick.

title: Garfield and Friends
description: Garfield the cat, along with Jon Arbuckle and Odie, brings comic-strip humor to the screen. The series also features U.S. Acres, focusing on barnyard antics. Laziness, sarcasm, and lasagna rule here.

title: Bionic Six
description: The Bennett family becomes cybernetically enhanced heroes to battle evil forces. Each member of the Bionic Six possesses a unique power in this fusion of family drama and futuristic action.

title: Centurions
description: With the battle cry 'PowerXtreme!', Max, Ace, and Jake don exo-suits that fuse them with weapon systems. They battle the robotic forces of Doc Terror in land, sea, and air combat.

title: Dungeons & Dragons
description: A roller coaster ride transports six kids to a fantasy realm. Guided by Dungeon Master, they fight monsters and villains while seeking a way home. Based on the famous tabletop RPG.

title: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
description: G.I. Joe, the elite strike team, battles Cobra—a ruthless terrorist organization. Known for its PSAs and epic action sequences, this show blended toy marketing with real-world themes of heroism.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: Four mutated turtles named after Renaissance artists—Leonardo, Donatello, Michelangelo, and Raphael—fight evil in New York’s sewers. Pizza-loving ninjas trained by a wise rat sensei.

title: Visionaries: Knights of the Magical Light
description: In a world where technology has failed, knights gain magical animal totems to fight evil. The Spectral Knights battle the Darkling Lords in a richly imagined realm of mystical warfare.
